Articles.Content:
Due to issues with moderation, my creative works will no longer be hosted on Squad official services. I apologize for the inconvenience. They may be available through other means which will not be linked here.

Edited January 30, 2015 by Alshain

Ahhh... this will make it a lot easier for those of us who are tired of mucking about with semi-unreliable Action Groups in order to change the lighting on our stations.

I hope you don't intend to have a cost for changing between BULB presets through the menu. There's little reason it should cost money to switch on and off different lights inside the unit, or even to have a Kerbal go out and swap them (no reason not to save the old bulb for when we want to change it back).
Liking this mod, I can see this getting absorbed by stock at some point.
What do I do with the ASETConfig folder?

What do I do with the ASETConfig folder?

If your using ASET's lights and want to use Bulb instead of the mod he uses (Vanguard), you can put that in the Bulb folder and it will disable Vanguard and add Bulb. Otherwise Bulb bows to the original author's design. If your not using those lights, don't install it, it won't do anything anyway. The major difference is Bulb is on the tweakables while the Vanguard one uses it's own UI. Also I think the Vanguard one vastly more presets, because it's in it's own UI. If I add to many to Bulb it would be hard to use.

Edited October 7, 2014 by Alshain
Ooh, shiny! Downloaded. Also, bumping this great mod. I hope this feature becomes stock in 0.26!
will these lights strobe like the ones on the Dragon?
Anyone tested this in 0.90? I'm going to test this in 0.90.

Anyone tested this in 0.90? I'm going to test this in 0.90.

it's working no bugs so far

Glad to hear it! It's a pretty simple mod, Squad would have to change some really specific stuff to break it. Never the less, I'll do some 'official' testing later tonight just to be sure and update the version number.

will these lights strobe like the ones on the Dragon?

No, it's not actually lights, just a method of changing their color in flight. I recommend Aviation Lights for strobes, but be warned, I can't change the colors of those.

Edited January 14, 2015 by Alshain

No, it's not actually lights, just a method of changing their color in flight. I recommend Aviation Lights for strobes, but be warned, I can't change the colors of those.

Oh drat, that's what I was planning to use it for.

Due to issues with moderation, my creative works will no longer be hosted on Squad official services. I apologize for the inconvenience. They may be available through other means which will not be linked here.

Hi, I came here via CKAN. Do you still post the source and licence to your mod? (And description?) It sounds neat, but I don't feel comfortable installing blindly.
